protein.specific_function: Hydrolyzes with similar activities ADP-ribose ADP-mannose, ADP-glucose, 8-oxo-GDP and 8-oxo-dGDP. Can also hydrolyze other nucleotide sugars with low activity.

reference.reference_text: Gasmi L, Cartwright JL, McLennan AG: Cloning, expression and characterization of YSA1H, a human adenosine 5'-diphosphosugar pyrophosphatase possessing a MutT motif. Biochem J. 1999 Dec 1;344 Pt 2:331-7.
